thread.title: One night stay-over for a wedding in the area
thread.title_full: One night stay-over for a wedding in the area - Review of The Marine Hermanus, Hermanus, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: David P
title: One night stay-over for a wedding in the area
text: On arrival we made to feel very welcome by everyone, from the porter meeting us in the parking lot the reception checking us into our room. We were escorted to our room and once again welcomed to the hotel. Needing to go to a wedding, we requested an iron and ironing board which was there within 5 minutes of requesting, amazing! The room itself was flawlessly set up for us and had a little bacony which overlooked the pool area. Super friendly staff, exceptional setting and a very well laid out breakfast. Allround the stay was a great pleasure and would definately make us go back there again. Thank you! David and Megan
